title: Vax Facts: A Deep Dive Into COVID-19 “Vaccines” (“CAVEAT EMPTOR” / INOCULATING FOR INFORMED CONSENT)
cleaned_text:
Publisher’s Note: December 2020 CDC update – 3,150 vaccine incapacitating “vaccine” injuries reported among health care workers. Read the CDC report here.

First things first. We are not PRO or ANTI vaccine. This “manufactured binary false framing” approach is a naive (some might say “infantile”) way to approach such a vital global public health issue. Vaccines are powerful industrial medical technologies, enmeshed in a corporate commercial for-profit global matrix, that MUST be considered, like any other medical technology, on a case by case basis. That said, read on. And consider signing the Stop Medical Discrimination petition online here – if you believe in Health Freedom, Informed Consent, and Human Sovereignty.

Second, if you are unfamiliar with the vital global public health debate over GERM THEORY (Louis Pasteur) versus TERRAIN THEORY (Antoine Bechamp), and “viruses” versus “exosomes,” here’s a useful overview.

Meanwhile, here in the Green Mountains…

While established Vermont news media outlets and Vermont public health officials collectively engage in status quo Big Pharma funded “group think” when exploring (non) questions about COVID “vaccines,” “corona awakening” Vermonters understand that the next big front in the Technocratic Transhumanist “Great Reset” COVID EMPIRE war on Team Human and natural herd immunity will be the public debate that is already unfolding over the widespread (and mandatory?) deployment of much-heralded and over-hyped COVID-19 quote unquote “vaccines” – which hit US states beginning this week. And don’t miss our Plan V-TV interview with Dr. Sucharit Bhakdi, a pro-vaccine champion who WARNS AGAINST the COVID-19 “vaccine” for all the reasons we’ve reported on here for months. Caveat Emptor! Inoculate yourself and your family, friends, and loved ones. Lives are at stake.

Exhibit A: You don’t need to be a so-called “anti vaxxer” to watch this chilling video of New York Governor Andrew Cuomo – Slasher of Pandemic Public Health Funding, Slayer of thousands of the COVID-infected elderly – gleefully watch as masked Queens neighborhood nurse of color Sandra Lindsay blankly stares straight ahead as she receives NYC’s very first “vaccine,” accompanied by polite clapping from the assembled.

Big Picture. After ten months of widespread economic destruction, physical distancing, mask wearing, and 24/7 MSM psy-ops, it is no wonder that ANY “public health solution” offered to get Humans out of this engineered COVIDtastrophe will be welcomed with enthusiasm.

Poll after poll seem to indicate that roughly half of the US civilian population are displaying what the Globalists and their Media Minions refer to, in Orwellian terms, as “vaccine hesitancy,” an understandable reluctance to inject an “emergency” labeled, technologically unprecedented, mostly untested, powerful new industrial factory-made technology politely dubbed a “vaccine” into their bodies.

Make no mistake – new and misnamed mRNA and DNA “vaccines” (really more like genetically altering human operating system software updates) DEMANDS careful research, reasoned understanding, and the collective exercise of “informed consent” – as VERY LITTLE is actually known about the consequences, positive or negative, of this new technology. A double-blind-placebo-tested-by-phased-trials vaccine takes between six and ten years to research, develop, test, safety proof, and bring to market. Under cover of the COVIDaganda, Big Pharma and the Globalists are rushing this “vaccine” into public health spaces at yes, “Warp Speed.”

Below: See US environmental attorney Robert F Kennedy Jr.’s short but astute analysis on the problems associated with the COVID-19 “vaccine” along with Spiro’s “Vaccinated versus Unvaccinated” interview with the thoughtful James Lyons Weiler, and Unlimited Hangout’s deep dive.

But first, here’s the official JAMA COVID-19 vaccine development presser – a good primer:

And Children’s Health Defense asks “How Will We Know That a COVID Vaccine Is Safe?”

Thanks to Unlimited Hangout for this thoughtful deep dive into the history, workings of, and possible consequences (pro and con) of this soon-to-be-arriving mRNA “vaccine” technology.

And yes, keep using “air quotes” with the V word.
